teas.name: Earl Gray
teas.Taste: This British Tea is typically a black tea base flavored with oil from the rind of bergamost orange. Typically has a citrus or floral infused taste
teas.Health Benefits: Boosts energy, improves immunity, and boosts metabolism

teas.name: English Breakfast Tea
teas.Taste: Flavor is stronger and more robust than that of green tea. It's rich flavor may be slightly sweet, bitter, or malty. Best paired with milk and sugar.
teas.Health Benefits: Many vitamins and minerals such as potassium,maganese, and Vitamin E. In addition it has a significant amount of thenanine, an amino acid that may help the drinker to relax.

teas.name: Irish Breakfast Tea
teas.Taste: Made from Assam, a black tea grown in India, this tea is known for its strong malty flavor. Unlike it's English counterpart, Irish Breakfast Teas tends to be more robust, more finely ground, and have a higher proportion of Indian black tea leaves.
teas.Health Benefits: Black teas such as these aid in digestion, reduce bloating, and sooth upset stomachs.

teas.name: Russian Caravan Tea
teas.Taste: Famous for its rich and smoky flavor, this tea is an acquired taste
teas.Health Benefits: High in antioxidants, heart health, reduces inflammation, and soothes headaches

teas.name: Indian Chai
teas.Taste: Often a sweet, fragrant concoation of black tea, milk, and spices that originate from India
teas.Health Benefits: Antioxidants, heart health, digestion, good for skin

teas.name: Oolong Tea
teas.Taste: Its taste is described as a floral, fruity with a thick mouthfeel.Known for its light 'grassy' taste.

teas.name: Darjeeling
teas.Taste: Known as the champagne of teas, it has a musky sweet flavor couples with citrus,mossy, and fruity flavors.
teas.Health Benefits: Reduces risk of cancer, weight loss, antioxidants, stress reliever

teas.name: Green Tea
teas.Taste: Its taste can include: sweet, bittersweet,nutty,fruity or even oceanic. It's taste has a wide range and usually depends on the way the leaves are prepared.
teas.Health Benefits: Improves brain function, cardiovascular health, burning of fat, and antioxidants
